mapper.insert: INSERT INTO STUDY(sy_no, title, content, file1, file2, size2, cnt, sy_date, gate) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(sy_no), 0)+1 as sy_no FROM STUDY), #{title}, #{content}, #{file1}, #{file2}, 0, 0, sysdate, #{gate})
mapper.select: SELECT sy_no, title, content, file1, file2, size2, cnt, sy_date, gate FROM STUDY WHERE sy_no=#{sy_no}
SELECT sy_no, title, content, file1, file2, size2, cnt, sy_date, gate , rownum FROM STUDY WHERE rownum >=#{startNum} AND rownum <= #{endNum} AND gate=#{gate} ORDER BY sy_no DESC
